summary: An ordinance granting to the Bon Marche Company, its successors and assigns, the right to maintain and operate until May 31, 1930, a tunnel across and under a portion of the alley in block twenty-five (25), of A.A. Denny's 3rd Addition to Seattle, specifying the conditions of such grant and providing for the filling by said grantee of an acceptance thereof and of a surety company bond.
